title: 500 error after calling some APIs
body:
### Description

_No response_

### Gitea Version

built from source

```
commit 7a59f5a8253402d6f98234bf0047ec53156d3af9 (HEAD -> main, origin/main, origin/HEAD)
Author: wxiaoguang <wxiaoguang@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Jun 9 15:06:21 2025 +0800

    Ignore "Close" error when uploading container blob (#34620)
```

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

### Log Gist

_No response_

### Screenshots

_No response_

### Git Version

_No response_

### Operating System

_No response_

### How are you running Gitea?

After calling some APIs, I suddenly encounter this error:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/54b5336f-0bcc-4c6e-8bae-40b60e4f9e7b)

```
2025/06/10 17:56:43 HTTPRequest [I] router: completed GET /%28non-existing-repo%29/%28non-existing-repo%29 for 11.176.18.12:21766, 404 Not Found in 9.3ms @ context/repo.go:379(context.RepoAssignment)
2025/06/10 17:56:47 HTTPRequest [I] router: polling   GET /user/events for 11.176.18.12:21766, elapsed 3807.6ms @ events/events.go:18(events.Events)
2025/06/10 17:56:50 .../context/context_response.go:87:(*Context).HTML() [E] Render failed: failed to render template: user/dashboard/dashboard, error: template error: builtin(bindata):user/dashboard/feeds:97:14 : executing "user/dashboard/feeds" at <ctx.RenderUtils.RenderCommitMessage>: error calling RenderCommitMessage: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
----------------------------------------------------------------------
                                                                        {{ctx.RenderUtils.RenderCommitMessage .Message $repo}}
                                                                             ^
----------------------------------------------------------------------
2025/06/10 17:56:50 HTTPRequest [I] router: completed GET / for 11.176.18.12:21998, 200 OK in 18.1ms @ web/home.go:32(web.Home)
2025/06/10 17:57:01 .../context/context_response.go:87:(*Context).HTML() [E] Render failed: failed to render template: user/dashboard/dashboard, error: template error: builtin(bindata):user/dashboard/feeds:97:14 : executing "user/dashboard/feeds" at <ctx.RenderUtils.RenderCommitMessage>: error calling RenderCommitMessage: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
```

How should I fix this? This only affects UI, the server process is still working fine AFAIK.
Any more information do I need to provide here?

### Database

None
